ComicInfo.Summary:
Love Is Scarier Than Death: An FBI agent tries to convince Hellboy to help her lure a monster that only attacks couples making out in the back seat of a car.
Cool Your Head: Hellboy goes on a camping trip.
Shattered: Hellboy tries to recover a Maya time-controlling artifact.
Doc Hollow's Grand Vibro-Destructo Machine Episode 5:: Lobster Johnson and his assistant find out the true identity of the Crimson Hood.
ComicInfo.Teams: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
